name: foretoken
description: A  fast, highly customizable, modern-day defence tool using (in memory) SQL & REST/gRPC protocols.
full_description:
Foretoken is a tool to scrape and defend against potential dangerous threats faced on the internet. It aims to be a highly customizable tool for companies and individuals to use to counter threats.

The docs are here: https://foretoken.domgolonka.com/

## Usage

docker run -d -p 8080:8080 domgolonka/foretoken --config=config.yml
